CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The increase in the short circuit current originates from the introduction of the thin titanium suboxide ( TiO x ) layer ( ca.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| titanium suboxide |
| TiO x |

In the given paragraph, the two "Material Name" entities are "titanium suboxide" and "TiO x". These entities are mentioned as the material involved in the introduction which leads to the increase in the short circuit current.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| titanium suboxide |

In the revised analysis, the only clear "Material Name" entity in the paragraph is "titanium suboxide". The other entity "TiO x" is a chemical formula representing titanium suboxide, and it does not explicitly refer to a material name in the same way as the phrase "titanium suboxide" does.
